metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5211 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A use after free in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 55.0.2883.75 for Mac, Windows and Linux, and 55.0.2883.84 for Android allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5211` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 55.0.2883.87-0ubuntu0.16.04.1263
chromium-browser-l10n - 55.0.2883.87-0ubuntu0.16.04.1263
chromium-chromedriver - 55.0.2883.87-0ubuntu0.16.04.1263
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 55.0.2883.87-0ubuntu0.16.04.1263
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 55.0.2883.87-0ubuntu0.16.04.1263
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.2883.87-0ubuntu0.16.04.1263').
